description: Delete the entire registry including schema and all of its versions. To get the status of the delete operation, you can call the GetRegistry API after the asynchronous call. Deleting a registry will deactivate all online operations for the registry such as the UpdateRegistry, CreateSchema, UpdateSchema, and RegisterSchemaVersion APIs.

parameters.name: RegistryId
parameters.description: This is a wrapper structure that may contain the registry name and Amazon Resource Name (ARN). RegistryName (string) --- Name of the registry. Used only for lookup. One of RegistryArn or RegistryName has to be provided. RegistryArn (string) --- Arn of the registry to be updated. One of RegistryArn or RegistryName has to be provided.

nested_items.name: RegistryName
nested_items.description: The name of the registry being deleted.

nested_items.name: RegistryArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the registry being deleted.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the registry. A successful operation will return the Deleting status.
